126661.ふふっ。面白い住人を見つけてしまった！\nイエローダイアリーに記載したから ぜひ:
Hehe. I found a resident I think might be
interesting! I listed them in the Diary, so,
by all means, please go and find them!
<break>

126662.「いいよ！ ご褒美の一覧を見せよう。\n<br>\n<break>: All right! Let's take a look at your rewards...

126663.「いいよ！ ご褒美の一覧を見せよう。:
All right! Let's take a look at your
rewards...

126664.「やあやあ <pc><if_woman>ちゃん<else>くん<endif>！:
Hey there, <pc>! What can I do for
you today? Or did you need to ask me
something?
<break>

126666.「何について 聞きたいのかな？\n<break>: What do you want to ask me about?<break>

126667.「<pc><if_woman>ちゃん<else>くん<endif>には\n 特定:
, I have enchanted Astoltia with the power to make certain residents' names appear yellow! Using this power, I want you to
find the residents of Astoltia I've chosen and talk to them! If I see that you have spoken to them, I will reward you on the spot with an
updated Yellow Name Diary. If you're ever in doubt about where to go, visit me or check out the Yellow Name Diary.

126668.「君に 渡したイエローダイアリーは \n 私のものと おそろいだぞ！\n<br>:
The Yellow Name Diary I gave you is a matching copy of mine! What's more, these two diaries have a magical feature that links your entries
to each other! If you write about an Astoltia resident in the one I have, it will be listed in the one I gave to . I'll fill
in the names of the residents I've chosen, so you can look it up in your Key Items. I'll be adding to the list each time I find a resident
I like, so keep an eye out for that, too!

126669.「私が選んだ 住人を 見つけだして \n 話すことができたら お礼として ひとり:
If you can find and talk to a resident of my choosing, I will reward you with a Mini Medal for each of them. I will also give you a
reward based on the number of people you talk to! Rewards can be found in the Yellow Name Diary. You can find the reward in the Yellow
Name Diary, or check the Key Items in the "Items" section.

126670.「他に 聞きたいことはあるかな？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you want to ask me
about?<break>

126671.「他に 何かあるかな？\n<break>:
Anything else you can think of?
<break>

126672.「また 面白い住人を見つけたら\n イエローダイアリーに追記していくから\n お:
If I find any other interesting residents,
I'll add them to the Diary, so please lend me
a hand if you can!
<end>

126673.「それじゃあ 引き続き がんばってくれ！\n 応援しているぞ！ ふふっ。\n<e:
Anyways, keep up the good work!
I'll be rooting for you!
<end>
